title: ISDE 10th Digital Earth Summit
description: The International Society for Digital Earth (ISDE), in collaboration with the University of Rwanda and the Rwanda Convention Bureau, is organising its 10th Digital Earth Summit, themed “Digital Intelligence to Sense our Planet and Sustain its Future” at the Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village, Kigali, Rwanda between 19 – 22 November 2024. Interested individuals are invited to submit an abstract that aligns with the following thematic areas.
